name: CartoonBrew(FlashBriefing)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Cartoon Brew is an animation news website created by Amid Amidi and Jerry Beck. Launched in 2004, the site has published news articles, commentaries and reviews regarding the animation industry.

Receive daily updates from Cartoon Brew in your Flash Briefing. This app is simply a reader of Cartoon Brew's public rss feed intended for users daily Flash Briefings. 

The developer of this skill is in no way officially affiliated with "Cartoon Brew" and has no plans of monetization, or anything other than the Flash Briefing operation of "Cartoon Brew's" public rss feed.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
